it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.example

Class MyGlimpseProbe_InfrastructureViolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.probe.GlimpseAbstractProbe
      • it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.example.MyGlimpseProbe_InfrastructureViolation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlimpseProbe

    public class MyGlimpseProbe_InfrastructureViolation
extends GlimpseAbstractProbe
    This class provides an example of how to send messages (events) to the Glimpse Monitoring Bus,
    there are three methods for sending event on which payload is

    a String: MyGlimpseProbe#generateAndSendExample_GlimpseBaseEvents_StringPayload(int),
    an Object: MyGlimpseProbe#generateAndSendExample_GlimpseBaseEvents_ObjectPayload(int),
    an Exception: MyGlimpseProbe#generateAndSendExample_GlimpseBaseEvents_ExceptionPayload(Exception)

    the sendEvent action behavior may be modified simply implementing the abstract method
    GlimpseAbstractProbe.sendMessage(GlimpseBaseEvent, boolean).
    In this class we used the classic sendEventMessage method provided by the abstract class GlimpseAbstractProbe

    You can directly implement your probe extending GlimpseAbstractProbe or directly implementing GlimpseProbe

    Version:
    3.3.1
    Author:
    Antonello Calabrò
